name: stock_v2_get_short_interest
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the short interest data for a given stock identified by its performance ID from the Morning Star API.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock obtained from endpoints like /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.
